titleStmt.title: His Maiesties declaration to all his loving subjects, after his victories over the Lord Fairfax in the north, and, Sr. William Waller in the west, and, the taking of Bristow by His Majesties forces
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by His Majesties command at Oxford, July 30, and reprinted at York by Stephen Bulkley,

notesStmt.note: "Charles R. Our expresse pleasure is, that this our declaration be published in all churches and chapples within the kingdom of England and dominion of Wales, by the parsons, vicars or curats of the same."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
